description.value:
These prosthetic feet and legs, created by dwarven alchemists and spellcasters together, are engraved with simple but effective evocation symbols on the ball and heel, empowering you to leap to great heights and blast foes with your feet.

Activate 1 envision

Frequency once per 10 minutes

Effect You blast off from the ground, using the force to leap through the air. The blast feet cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Jump] on you.

Activate 2 envision, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You blast from your feet, dealing @Damage[4d6[force]|traits:area-damage] damage to all creatures in a @Template[type:cone|distance:15], with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:22|basic:true|traits:evocation,magical] save.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Grand Bazaar
